title: John Muir National Historic Site: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved       Looking for ways to get involved?    NPS Centennial 2016 is the 100th birthday of the National Park Service. Find out what we're doing to get ready, and look for ways that you can help!  Partners Non-Profit park partners are an important park of the NPS park system. Click here to learn more about their roles in our park.  Work With Us Want a job with us? Check out this page for ways to find out about current positions in our park.  Planning Planning is an important part of keeping our park going. Volunteer Do you like working with people and love history?
